name: workspace_logging_collect
short_description: Collects Workspace Audit logs and dumps them on the filesystem.
description:
Collects logs from Workspace Audit log and dumps them on the filesystem.

See https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/reports/reference/rest/v1/activities/list#ApplicationName for a list of application names.

For filters, see https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/reports/reference/rest/v1/activities/list.
args: Name of application to to collect logs for. See https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/reports/reference/rest/v1/activities/list#ApplicationName for a list of possible values.
email address of the user to query logs for
Filter expression to use to query Workspace logs. See https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/reports/reference/rest/v1/activities/list.
